org.jgentleframework.core.handling
Class AbstractDefinitionController

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.handling.AbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher
      org.jgentleframework.core.handling.AbstractDefinitionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefinitionManager, IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher, IAnnotationVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefinitionManagerImpl
public abstract class AbstractDefinitionController
extends AbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher
implements DefinitionManager

Quản lý các phương thức điều khiển các module là các extension-point trong khi thực thi xử lý annotation, bao gồm việc diễn dịch annotation thành AnnoMeta, quản lý DefinitionPostProcessor, AnnotationBeanProcessor, ...

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Adds a AnnotationBeanProcessor

Specified by:
addAnnotationBeanProcessor in interface DefinitionManager
Parameters:
handler - the AnnotationBeanProcessor need to be registered.
Returns:
returns previous AnnotationBeanProcessor if it exists, if not, returns null.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - this exception will be thrown if not found the valid annotation class corresponding type T

Registers an AnnotationBeanProcessor
